title: BST:  Looking for some Hall of Fame portraits, some to trade as well
author: bounce

posts.post_title: BST:  Looking for some Hall of Fame portraits, some to trade as well
posts.post_content:
Started the Hall of Famers earlier this summer, hoping to find some to buy and/or even trade.

I want the portrait card if there are multiple poses.  Portrait's are my main focus.

I'm looking for cards in PSA 3-5 range (would consider SGC and BVG as well but I prefer PSA).

I do NOT want creases but rounded corners generally don't bother me.
I do not want any with paper loss, I'm not picky about the backs.
I'd like pretty good centering as well, but overall looking for cards that display nicely as I'm going to display these.

PM is best way to reach me, but you can post in the thread as well if you'd like.

Here's what I'm looking for:
Ty Cobb red
Ty Cobb green
Walter Johnson
Christy Mathewson
Tris Speaker
John McGraw
Eddie Collins
Willie Keeler
Roger Bresnahan
Fred Clarke
Jimmy Collins
Hugh Duffy
Hughie Jennings
Frank Chance yellow or red
Jack Chesbro
Johnny Evers
Clark Griffith
Joe Mcginnity
Joe Tinker
Rube Waddell
Ed Walsh
Mordecai Brown
Chief Bender
Bobby Wallace
Frank Baker


I have these that I might consider trading for the right deal:
Cy Young portrait Piedmont SGC 60 (I would consider "trading down" to a slightly lower grade Young, otherwise this is not available)
Nap Lajoie throwing Piedmont PSA 4
Nap Lajoie batting Old Mill SGC 50
Nap Lajoie portrait Piedmont SGC 55
